text: Dapinglin is a metro station on the Songshan-Xindian Line and Circular Line in New Taipei, Taiwan. The Songshan-Xindian line station code is G04 and the Circular line station code is Y07. == Station layout information == === Songshan-Xindian line === The platforms are located underground. Platform 1 is for Songshan and Platform 2 is for Xindian. === Circular line === This is currently the only underground station on the Circular line. Both Platforms 1 and 2 are for New Taipei Industrial Park. == Around the station == *Jing-Mei White Terror Memorial Park Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Dapinglin metro station
